title.rendered: Agency Go-to-Guide: The Ultimate Client Plan for Marketing Automation

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1570735615474{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1582042856329{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 5% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Learn the fab four client goals and the step-by-step process for delivering results.

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1560952216578{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]If you’re ready to build marketing automation into your menu of agency services you’ll probably want to start by offering it to existing clients as an upsell. But how do you decide which clients would benefit most from the service, and how do you prove that it’s working?

In this special three-section guide you’ll learn:

  • How to set the right goal for the right client
  • How to customize your pitch for each client’s goal
  • 6 tips to doubling campaign ROI quickly
  • How to bundle your services to attract new clients

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”custom-testimonial hidden-xs”][vc_column_inner][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Send it to me
[/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_js][/vc_raw_js][/vc_column][/vc_row]
